info.name: colorful dashboard
info.description: this is kind of a compilation of several themes. the background is an edit of a pattern I found. I just really wanted to get rid of those few errors where the Tumblr blue was still showing through :)

style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);        @-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com/'), url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com/')   {   #dashboard_index,  #dashboard_inbox,  #dashboard_edit_post,  #dashboard_submissions,  #dashboard_drafts,  #dashboard_post_queue,  #dashboard_likes,  #dashboard_followers,  #dashboard_following,  #dashboard_directory,  #dashboard_lookup_contacts,  #main_doc_page,  #dashboard_settings,  #dashboard_create_tumblelog,  #dashboard_members,  #main_tag,  #main_meetups,  #main_about,  #main_explore,  #dashboard_goodies,  #main_developers,  #main_themes,  #dashboard_manage_themes,  #main_edit_theme,  #main_jobs,  #main_policy,  #dashboard_tumblelog_settings {  background:#dae4f7 url(http://i42.tinypic.com/35jb1ue.jpg) repeat center left fixed!important }    #dashboard_index div.l-content,  #dashboard_inbox div.l-content,  #dashboard_submissions div.l-content,  #dashboard_drafts div.l-content,  #dashboard_post_queue div.l-content,  #dashboard_likes div.l-content,  #dashboard_followers div.l-content,  #dashboard_members div.l-content,  #main_tag div.l-content,  #dashboard_tumblelog_settings #left_column, #right_column {background-color: transparent !important;}

div.l-content.l-content.l-content {  background:rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important }    .selection_nipple { border-bottom-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important }        .permalink { background: none !important }    .avatar_frame {  background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1) !important; border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1) !important }    .notification {  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important;  border: rgba(255,255,255,0.1) !important;  background-image: none !important;  margin-bottom: 1px !important }    .notification a { border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important }  .notification a:hover { border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.3) !important }    .notification_type_icon { display: none !important }    .nipple { border-right-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.07) !important }        .controls_section li { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important }  .with_subtitle small { color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important }  .recessed a { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important }  .radar { display: none !important }        * { text-shadow: none !important }    h1, .title { color: rgba(0,0,0,0.6) !important }    .no_posts_found, h1.dashboard_header { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9) !important }    .dashboard_options_form {  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.1) !important;  border: none !important;  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important }    .dashboard_options_form_disclaimer, .dashboard_options_form_disclaimer a { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9) !important }    .blue_note, .blue_note a {  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important;  color: rgba(0,0,0,0.6) !important }        #footer, #footer a {  border: none !important;  color: rgba(0,0,0,0.5) !important }   #pagination a {  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.4) !important;  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important }  #pagination a:hover {  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9) !important }    #dashboard_controls a, #dashboard_controls .control {  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important }    .dashboard_controls_arrow_first_page, .dashboard_controls_arrow_left, .dashboard_controls_arrow_right {  display: none !important }  #left_column #posts .post .post_avatar{-moz-border-radius: 38px !important; -webkit-border-radius: 60px !important; width: 64px !important; height: 64px !important; margin: 0px !important;}  #left_column #posts .post .sub_avatar_inner {  -moz-border-radius: 38px !important; -webkit-border-radius: 60px !important; width: 32px !important; height: 32px !important; margin: 0px !important;  }   }
